Reviews.Title: Inexpensive introduction to Apple
Reviews.Author: Edward J Garrett
Reviews.Content: Though I have owned three Apples in the past, everything has changed.  With my new iPhone 5s I want to change over to Apple in everything.  So, I purchased this used, refurbished Mac from a California company that has been doing Apple refurbish and sale for many years.  Just over $300, this computer is fast and easy to learn to use.  It looks brand new, albeit a little outdated in appearance.  It is a 2009 MacBook.  Within a year I will replace it with the strongest and best Apple computer made.

Reviews.Title: Happy Grandaughter
Reviews.Author: BigJim
Reviews.Content: My granddaughter had saved up her pennies to get a new computer, and really wanted an apple macbook pro, but the cost was beyond her reach, so she chose a regular macbook instead and loves it!  Sellers description was spot on condition wise and it seems to work great.  So she has her apple and a few pennies left over and everyones happy.  I have the macbook pro and this one runs almost as fast as mine.  A great ways to get into an apple and not have to break the bank to do it.Big Jim  (aka Pop Pop)
